sentences.sContent: WL: I think, Yorkshire and the New Forest.
sentences.sContent_eng: WL: I think, Yorkshire and the New Forest.
sentences.sCn: 我想，是约克郡和新森林地区。

sentences.sContent: Yorkshire puddings are an accompaniment to Sunday roasts; some would say the best part of the meal.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yorkshire puddings are an accompaniment to Sunday roasts; some would say the best part of the meal.
sentences.sCn: 约克郡布丁是周日烤肉的必备；有些人会说这是膳食中最好的一部分。

sentences.sContent: Whether or not your Yorkshire puddings rise is the true test of your cooking ability.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether or not your Yorkshire puddings rise is the true test of your cooking ability.
sentences.sCn: 不管怎样，约克郡布丁是真正考验烹饪技能的一道点心。

phrases.pCn: 西约克郡（位于英国英格兰北部）
南约克郡（英国苏格兰北部一个郡）
北约克郡（英国一个地区）

trans.tranCn: 约克郡,约克夏(英国英格兰原郡名)
